Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Good atmosphere and Good menu nice chilled vibes

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Bought the pure indica one, small amount of weed, tip is longer then de joint itself, on first impression also tastes like herbal mix so not even 100% pure. Wouldn‚Äôt recommend here. Pretty steep prices for not so good products.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Perfect location, great high quality weed. Kind staff. Just the best place to hangout and chill. Always the bestüî•üíØ

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: One of the best coffee shops around! Employees are very friendly and able to help with any and all questions. Cozy area, nice for relaxing and enjoying time with friends. Great selection as well. Strongly recommend.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
It's a very good coffeeshop, the welcome is very friendly, the atmosphere too.
The varieties sold are of good quality.
I recommend it.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Sweet Cat in the smoking area, good weed selection, very friendly staff and we even got a free lighter, thanks!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: This is my favourite place to go, staff is very friendly. The place is very homely and comfortable and there is a fat cat also, he is the best and so cute

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: A nice coffee shop in de pijp. It‚Äôs very well priced and had the best quality bud that I sampled the weekend I visited. It‚Äôs much better to get into coffee shops far from the red light district, with this being in de pijp I was confident it ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: The ‚Äújoint‚Äù was laced with tobacco and was super harsh because of that. Normally they have tobacco & marijuana products clearly marked.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: The owner mislead us by insisting on us buying his products without letting us inside the shop after the purchase. He would‚Äònt even allow us to use the toilet. ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Big local with many seats with sofa and tables, very friendly reporting the amsterdam restrictions

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
Really good weed and muffins are amazing
It was an amazing experience to show us how they do it, the cook that he makes them is very nice! ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: The cat was the best part, they also have comfy couches, i came back a year later on my birthday and the cat is still there and the the staff gave me free juice!!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great place for a coffee! Great selection of books and stuff produced by the School of Life. They do regular classes and workshops here on philosophy and life. Really cool spot! The main room is no laptops, but there is a workshop room where you can work away to your heart's content.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Pretty sure that most of the 5 star reviews are paid for. Notice that majority only have a single review and it's this place? Unlikely. ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Nice flow off decor light chilax atmosphere well nice little gem coffee shop

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
Go here for a splendid high class lounge

The lounge here is better than maybe anywhere in amsterdam. The relaxed couches ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Nice place to sit, but pre-rolled joints contains too much tobacco and 1g bags are more like 0.8g

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Cool. Super. Nice

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great service, really comfortable seating and lovely products!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: This is a really chill spot with great vibes and good music. For a bonus they have a cat! Literally a cute orange cat! The space is designed really cool. Different levels, depending on what kind of vibe you want. Perfect place is you want a chill quiet not too crowded place to smoke. Definitely would suggest checking it out.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Nice relaxing atmosphere, not too touristy. Good choices of herb. But they don't take Mastercard and the edibles taste like herb which ruined the cupcake even though it was moist and potent.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Staff was friendly and the place had a good atmosphere, chill vibes. I loved the options and bought some Pineapple Xpress, it was very compact so the staff recommended grinding it which I appreciated. The lounge area was nicely decorated ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Very kind guy who served us, he even gave us raw papers for free. The weed is absolute gas (I usually get in Cali and it‚Äôs very close)

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great atmosphere and very friendly staff. Nice selection of strains, with some world cup winners. and they are well priced. Place is big, so you can coming in groups bigger than four people :)

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
Nice guy serving. Very patient and accommodating and friendly. Very helpful. Pre rolled joints (sativa) are 10 each if I recall correctly. There are cheaper places to get it but oh well. Thanks!
Edit in response to reply from owner.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Prices are not the cheapest, but they do have decent deals and their cheapest stuff is pretty good too. Atmosphere is amazing, cute stoned cat, lots of space, different rooms, great music and very friendly staff. If you wanna stay and chill ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: A slightly confusing aesthetic with the smokers lounge meeting the Mediterranean brick being lit by Morrocan lanterns (guess that's a nod to the hash). Watch out for the crocodiles! Incredibly comfy sofas with some very jam beats to bun up ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great coffeeshop. The prices are a little higher than expected but the service, atmosphere and weed are very good.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
Really cool vibe, lots of room to sit down, good products, friendly staff

Just one problem is that it's really really smoky in here. And not the good kind ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Awesome. Brilliant stuff and great prices. Also two wonderful and completely different seating areas.. Downstairs is more chilled and laid back with less impressive(but firing) decor, then upstairs is beautiful, with a variety of furnishings that are all pretty elegant to be fair. Our favorite coffee shop.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Second time in Amsterdam and visited a few times. Lots of seating great for groups of people just looking for good weed or just a quiet smoke. Our favourite coffeeshop in Amsterdam and will be back again to visit. Great staff and great products. It also has the cutest resident cat.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: It is ugly, it is slow, and it smells bad. I cannot get all these tourist positive reviews on this very bad place, where nothing's worth having a look around. Clearly many better places and less far from the center!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
Thanks you for the blessings!!!

Best weed, fair prices! and good coffee!!!!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: A perfect place to relax & enjoy some great coffee in a friendly, modern atmosphere.  I've visited this spot on many occasions & have never been disappointed.  The menu describes them as 'highly addictive' and they are not kidding. I amazed ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: A very plea sent experience indeed. Spent a few good days of my holiday at this place. The menu was just simply amazing and the nice music played in the background was truly a pleasant experience. Will definitely go again if I am ever back in the country.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Amazing coffeeshop, great menu and prices, tasty edibles, fantastic bud and Good vibes, friendly staff and a pretty cool owner, you feel welcome and respected. Nice decor and several TVs, music, whether you choose to hop on a bar stool or kick-back on the sofas this relaxed place couldn't get any more chill.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: One of the best coffeeshops I went in. On the outskirts of the city which means it's quiet with the odd few locals in. Chilled upstairs section with comfy couches and a comforting cat wandering about the place. Awesome vibe to smoke your head off!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Best strains of weed available and the cashier was straight forward with no personality. I visiting in summer and it was way to hot inside with no grinders or bongs available to use but provided rolling papers and roaches. Place to buy weed and smoke elsewhere. I would come back for the green crack!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Unimpressive and a rip-off. Bought an over-priced muffin, ate the whole thing and felt absolutely nothing. The guy behind the counter was neither friendly nor pleasant, like he had so much to do and I was bothering him with my purchase - ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: THIS PLACE IS AMAZING. My boyfriend and I were on a trip to Amsterdam and accidentally meet the owner while having beer. Awesome guy with lots of advice. This is the place to come and enjoy your smoke, just chill and recuperate! From all of ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Coffeeshop IBIZA was the first coffee shop me and my boyfriend came into after landing in Amsterdam.   There was a lovely selection of choice but ultimately I persuaded my boyfriend to go with agent orange. One of my favourites by far. ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: We took the long way round to find it from the centre! But when we found it the guy was proper friendly and the atmosphere was great. Had the football on as well so we spent a nice afternoon downstairs chilling. We'll  be back soon!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
Today he sold me 0.83 in stead of 1 g.
I saw him leaving something on the bottom of his jar just after he checked the weight, I saw him that he noticed that small piece of hash. Was Caramelo hash 13 euro per gram. He made me pay 12.50 with no reason. My professional scale says 0.83 üëçüèª

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: I've been here about three times now and I love this place! I discovered Coffeeshop IBIZA Amsterdam by chance when getting off work one day. That day, I had an AMAZING cookies and cream cupcake with a great cup of coffee. There is a great ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
Great buds, top shelf. Always a good selection as well, and it changes often.
Has a big tv where they usually play sports, some board games and arcade games, and plenty of seating space. In a very quiet area so its not touristy as well!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Really great coffeeshop with a nice chill environment. Staff are nice and will do their best to make your stop a pleasant one. The nice young girl seen in this video plays there often and really adds to the atmosphere.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: The Stud has the friendliest staff of any coffee shop I have ever been to. The quality of the weed is excellent, and they are very knowledgeable about their products. I'd definitely recommend a tourist or local to try them out.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: I absolutely love this place, it reminds me of old coffee shop that i use to go, but a lot more affordable. The people who work there really invite you in, they always have a smile on their faces and I've never been to a better coffee shop ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Excelent mood, the staff is fantastic, everything is cool and immersed on a fine-energy cloud. There's an anthologic cat always sleeping next to the cashier. It was recomended by a friend, and I'm glad my first time in a coffee shop was at the best one.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: I've been here several times and always liked it. Great atmosphere and a good selection of what I want. Like to sit in the window with a coffee and spliff while I glance at the steady stream of tourists outside... :-)

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: After smoking joints in the past 3 days, we took a break by coming here. What a great decision. Good weed and nice staff. A+++ will come back again.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Good quality weed, much better then in the centre!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Staff was very friendly and courteous. I was looking for edibles. They sent me around the corner to AMNESIA.  This place only had chocolate muffins.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Best coffee shop!! Comfy, friendly and loud strains at the best prices. Nice cake as well. Great spot for new smokers and pros!! Check it out and you won't be disappointed.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
I come here everytime, for the Green Crack and you never fail me!
Nice chilled place for a lovely smoke too!
Staff always nice and relaxed vibe.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Sorry to say that we were cheated out of the correct change.  I received change for $20 when I paid with a  $50.  I brought this to the attention of the guy at the counter not 2 minutes after the transaction was completed and he refused to ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Was staying at a hotel near by, been going there for a few days so bought alot from there, and on my last day me and my girlfriend came in too get 2 fantas and a sit down. After buying the cans we told we would have too buy weed if we ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great coffeeshop for the beginners, but also for the expert looking for a relaxed smoke. Staff is generally nice and helpful, drinks are always around 2 euros. Good vibes and great music, also!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: They had a great selection of 'coffees'. Great friendly service. It has a nice spot upstairs to smoke and chill. Nice atmosphere, chilled and relaxing, no pressure if you're a tourist.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Very good coffeshop, love it!!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Probably one of the coolest little coffee shops in Amsterdam. When I visited on vacation I checked out quite a few different shops but this one was defiantly one of my favorites. There is a big variety to choose from and they have a chilled laid back atmosphere. This place is a must whenever you visit Amsterdam.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great atmosphere, cool environment and good selection of herbs. Fairly priced drinks too. Very comfortable and relaxed with friendly service. This place is worth travelling to and I would recommend to anyone!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: I had visited many different coffee shops on my week long stay in Amsterdam but these guys were the best. Friendly and explained the different selections for a newbie like me. The snacks were a great addition too!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: The BEST Coffeeshop in the area. I love this place. It's a quiet, comfortable, homey environment to hang out, have a conversation, or just hang out. Great atmosphere. They really takes care of their customer's too.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Enjoy a coke and the best menu in town. Cheers

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Really realxed atmosphere. Weed is quite nice and the staff is super friendly. Our most favourite coffeeshop in Amsterdam by now!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: One of the best shops to live next to, opens early and  closes late, product is always good quality and reasonably priced and they nearly always have everything in stock. Friendly staff and great prices on lighters and grinder, leuk!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
Gorgeous place.
I was only in Amsterdam for a couple days but ended up going to Ibiza  3 times.
The filter coffee is ridiculously good and made with a lot of love by very kind baristas.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great local coffee shop. Don't ask for any fancy type of coffee, that isn't their specialty. Their hot chocolate is still good though. Good prices and product when it comes to the other stuff.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great local coffee shop. Don't ask for any fancy type of coffee, that isn't their specialty. Their hot chocolate is still good though. Good prices and product when it comes to the other stuff.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Can tourists still smoke weed? I'm planning on coming here in september.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Decent products. More expensive, then purchasing in the States. However, if you're looking for nice smokable flower, you won't be disappointed. Enjoy!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Recently been here a few weeks ago when I went on holiday with my friends. The service here was amazing, the staff where so friendly in helping us trough the menu and explaining very clearly what is best. The atmosphere is very nice and peaceful. I really suggest this place to anyone.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: walk past and thought Id give it a try... OMG this place is off the chart people are great and mood setting is top shelf! thanks for the great visit

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: My boyfriend and I visited daily during our 3 day stay in Amsterdam. Akshay was wonderfully accommodating- even lent us a grinder so we wouldn't have to purchase one for the short time we were there. It's a cozy place that feels like you're ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great service, we did not know how to row a weed. And they taught us with great attitude. It's also cheaper than others coffeeshop. Wonderful place.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Awesome vibe when looking for a good relaxed time out. Music was great with a lot of recognisable South African beats. Definitely a must do if you're in town.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Loved the place. Was there everyday when my partner and I recently visited Amsterdam (for the brownies and muffins). I will definitely be going again, and have already recommended it to several friends!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Really cool and cosy coffee shop! In the back you can see different pictures of a lot of celebrities who also enjoyed their time there. The service is really friendly and helpful, too.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Nice Service, nice weed , just don't use the part down stairs,  it's a little cold and silent (no music)

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
I love this place! Nice music. One of the coolest little coffee shops in Amsterdam and definately one of my favourites due to its
chilled laid back atmosphere. Definitely recommended if you visit Amsterdam.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: I liked this place a lot, a fairly good choice of weed and a really nice lounge where you can chill and smoke. Definitely one of the better places I visited

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Finished every night here as close to hotel. Excellent all round plus spacious and comfy....only problem is coffee machine is off by 11pm which aint ideal :)

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Pretty chill slightly overpriced but solid weed. To the high AF budtender taking off his shirt and trolling Americans... You gave me green crack by accident, ty for the upgrade :D

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
Rudest stuff i ever seen,
X2 times more expesive, everywhere else.
Pure indica joint price 10eu - weed was good, but size of joint made me laught. ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: GREAT SPOT!!! Had a chill time when I was there. Place is relaxed with friendly staff, thanks to the staff for all the suggestions for what to do while I was in town. If you ever go to Amsterdam, make sure you check this place out!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: It has one of the best smoking rooms among all Amsterdam coffeeshops; probably the most comfortable sofas. Great weed but abive average prices.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: the best. High quality products. The staff is good, but the way this place could relax you, it's unbelievable!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Guess it is the best coffee shop in town. Doesn't have all types of weed but it is still a great place, cozy, warm, good music, friendly staff that would explain about things when you ask, great prices and always crowded!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Stunning selection of weed. Nice budtender.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: One of our favourite Coffeeshops in Amsterdam! Awesome chilled out vibe with good music. Friendly stuff and good selection of weed! Recommended!!!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: It was ok. All the people look kind of disconnected and judgmental, they only have one pool table which makes it difficult to play.. but other than that it was a nice place

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Best coffeshop of amsterdam, seriously good quality and prices are way better than the city!! Employees are fun and nice aswell  verry pattiend and helpfull we had the best time in "DAM" because of akshay that men made us tripp more than worth for it. Dont forget to tip your d/healer haha that guy....

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: My favorite coffeeshop in Amsterdam (as a local)! Great quality. They have informative displays that shows exactly what effects you can expect and where your products came from originally

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great atmosphere, comfy couches and informative of their products. They also have the cutest cat!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: We had a blast at this friendly an wonderful place. They baked goods are so good that I can't stop eating it. Coffee is amazing too!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Nice chilled atmosphere, music was good, weed excellent, lost a couple of hours in here, definitely recommend x

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Lovely coffee shop it's about 1.8 miles from the town centre. Prices are a bit expensiver than in the city  staffs are lovely also the music . Good stuff here. Yeah Mon!!!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
Got to say the most relaxing and comfortable place we found
Staff are brilliant
Music not to loud
Big telly with the football on

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: The atmosphere inside is galactic. Great place to chill with a joint. Little expensive and the staff are rude, but who cares when you are stoned

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: One of the best places I've ever been to! I wish I could go back... if you're in Amsterdam and you're looking for a coffeeshop you need to visit this one. Really nice vibe, so cozy.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Out of all coffee shops I visited this was my favorite. Everyone was friendly and i will be returning with my partner during our next vacation. Very Comfy place

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: One of the best coffeshops in town, has a lot of space, comfortable, great music and the workers are really nice as well, will definitely come back in my next trip to amsterdam.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: A really calm experience, the couches are really comfortable and there a cat which is just slumped all the time, wouldn't recommend stroking the cat as it does bite.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Really nice atmosphere, chilled and relaxing, no pressure if you're a tourist, behind the bar are friendly and always willing to help.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: This coffee shop is a great place to spend time with your family and friends. Having meetings here is also ideal. Try them, you'll not get disappointing.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Oreo cheesecake is a must try! You will definitely love its sweetness. This goes well with their hot black coffee.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
Service was ok. Good products
Upstairs was perfect with a chill atmosphere and some couches with a big tv

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
Enjoyed the Coffee they have, specifically with their very reasonable prices.
The owner very friendly and smiling all the time.
I definitely recommend this place.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Gritty neighborhood coffeeshop with a friendly staff and crowd. Watch out for the green crack!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Good selection. Open till 1am

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
A must for every Austrian!
Proper couches.
Price is middle high. ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: One of the IF not the best shop in Amsterdam hands down. Knowledgeable and friendly staff.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: The most cozy and beautiful coffeshop in Amsterdam... Great stuff and good products; simply amazing. I strongly recommend it, you can't miss it!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Good vibes in here get your self down to this coffee shop make sure u try the green crack amazing blows my head off everytime

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Always very Friendly and great Stuff... one of my Favorite spots. Try the Cookies, they are awesome and the cake too!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: personally the best coffeeshop in Amsterdam. comfy atmosphere, nice staff, free vapes and bongs, very good weed and hash, good soft drinks and low prices... it must be visited!!!!!!!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Love, love, love this place. Super friendly service. Good coffee. Good snacks, great quiches. Just perfect.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text:
Very nice place, lot of people in there. And great coffee .Prices is good.
Location is excellent!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Nice cakes, good weed. Friendly staff that help with any issues. Very near train station, good atmosphere, and near various food places

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Friendly staff and nice place to chill . Drinks are cheaper compared to city center. Would love to visit again .

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: It has a calm ambience. You can easily relax and do stuff but you have to buy something to eat or drink to relax in the cafe.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Really nice place for chill. Good atmosphere with some questionable music choices.. üíØ

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: One of the best coffeeshops in Amsterdam in my opinion got great feel good seats friendly staff on of the best strains too

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great little place close to the Albert kuyp market, good selection of strains, comfy couches. A.c., very nice to cool down and light up in de pijp.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: The coolest coffeeshop and the music is really good. I come here every 3-4 months. Where can I find your music easy times?

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: I was in February with my boyfriend. Really nice place in Amsterdam, one of the best coffeshop. Friendly service, good music. Nice atmosphere.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: No 3 tram ride, a short walk along beautiful streets and stumbled across this perfect little oasis of calm.  Market close by makes it a find on my last day.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great atmosphere. Mix of all ages. Very reasonably priced drinks and food for somewhere so close to the city centre.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Music was very loud. Many people. Took over 30 mins to get coke. Cant truly recommend. M√§

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Lovely place, staff were always very friendly, very affordable prices, no drinks over 2‚Ç¨ and the weed was quality as well, definitely recommended trying the 420 Haze

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Cool place,  Nice staff. I had a really good time!!! Definately coming back before my vacation is over!!!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Cool, chilled atmosphere. Quiet and comfy sofas. Good selection of weed.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Friendly staff, comfortable couches and generally enjoyable atmosphere. 10/10 would recommend

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great coffee shop, good prices and great ambiance. Staff was really nice and we had a great time!!!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Really good coffeeshop to just chill out and smoke. It's quiet and not so crowded, and the weed is totally worth it's price.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Really relaxed atmosphere and good food. Staff were very friendly. Overall, it was awesome!!!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Relaxed atmosphere, friendly staff. Spent a few good hours with friends here and would visit again next time I'm in the 'dam.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Comfy sofas, quite spacious. Blue dream strain was poor don't bother.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great place , good coffee and good atmosphere , need to go back and check if you can request music :)

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: From the moment i stepped in I felt at home, the staff are some of the most polite and helpful I've ever encountered and the menu is just brilliant with it's huge selection.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Absolutely Great loved it had a pretty good time there with my friends definitely gonna go back there some time.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Amazing coffeeshop, really calm atmoshpher and really good music. Friendly staff 10 1

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Nice small corner store coffee shop! Perfect chill vibe. Very uncommerricalized which is the game changer!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: My personal favorite coffeeshop, relaxed atmosphere and good seating area. Not to mention the animal documentaries on the tv add to a great experience

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: I visited the other day for the first time and I was impressed.the coffee was to die for and the staff and atmosphere were delightful.thanks,I'm  absolutely coming back!!!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Really nice little coffeeshop a little afar from the center, feels like you're at home smoking a joint. Nice sofas and chill music, perfect to spend a cold afternoon

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Great seating area and good weed, Carmelo hash was the nicest hash I'd tried

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Probably one of my favourites in the city if a little expensive compared to some others. Great location, comfortable and quality products and service.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Probably one of my favourites in the city if a little expensive compared to some others. Great location, comfortable and quality products and service.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Probably one of my favourites in the city if a little expensive compared to some others. Great location, comfortable and quality products and service.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Friendly bartender, chill lightning and music, good quality stuff. Good vibes from all around :)

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Cool place, Really good food. I Highly recommend stopping in if you get a chance!!!

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Perfect place to chill and smoke with great service and quality.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: I love this place! Best coffeeshop with a good selection of music and the atmosphere is brilliant. I will definitely visit this place when I return to Amsterdam.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: Nice cozy spot to relax and hang out. Really good selection, price is a bit high imo.

Name: Coffeeshop Ibiza
Review Text: One of the coolest little coffee shops in Amsterdam and definately one of my favourites due to its chilled laid back atmosphere. Definitely recommended if you visit Amsterdam.
